The CDU and Germany's rival Social Democrats (SPD) were neck-and-neck in the polls. North Rhine-Westphalia is Germany's most populous state, and analysts see the election as an important indicator of the popularity of the current SPD-led governing coalition under SPD Chancellor Olaf Scholz.
